description: ICT Timeframe Hierarchy - Structure provides market direction, Confirmation validates setup, Entry executes trade

1h.rationale: 4H provides swing structure, 2H confirms pullback/continuation, 1H for precise entry

2h.rationale: 1D provides major trend, 4H confirms retracement/breakout, 2H for entry

4h.rationale: 1D major trend, 4H both confirms and executes (swing trading)

1d.rationale: 1W macro trend, 1D both confirms and executes (position trading)

penalty_explanation.structure_penalty: Structure TF missing (25%): Can't validate major trend direction
penalty_explanation.confirmation_penalty: Confirmation TF missing (15%): Can't validate intermediate pattern
penalty_explanation.misaligned_bias: Structure bias conflicts with entry bias (20%): Counter-trend risk
penalty_explanation.fallback: Using fallback TF instead of preferred (10%): Sub-optimal analysis
